title: Random Quote
description: This challenge is a great introduction to using external API in your application. The challenge is to create a small random quote application that requires you to work with JavaScript.

userStories.content: Create a random quote app that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create the basic structure.
Add author name, quote, tag,.. according to the design.
Users should be able to see a random quote when they first visit the page.
Users should be able to see a random quote after they select the random button.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
